items.title: iOS 26：iPhone主屏幕有哪些变化 (原标题: iOS 26: What's Changed With the iPhone's Home Screen)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# iOS 26：iPhone主屏幕变化概览

iOS 26 引入了全新的“液态玻璃”（Liquid Glass）设计，显著改变了 iPhone 的主屏幕界面，同时提供了高度自定义选项。以下是 iPhone 主界面的主要变化汇总。

## 液态玻璃设计
![iOS 26 Home Screen Features](https://images.macrumors.com/t/IPBSSjdBzAp7odkCCnTBIg7VtGk=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/iOS-26-Home-Screen-Features.jpg?lossy)
默认情况下，应用图标呈现出分层、微妙深度的外观，看起来像是多层玻璃堆叠在一起，形成半透明的玻璃效果。
![ios 26 home screen](https://images.macrumors.com/t/edGBouUrqPECMbgFZa0mBg8wZeU=/400x0/article-new/2024/11/ios-26-home-screen.jpg?lossy)

*   **应用图标：** 苹果为 Safari、地图、照片、App Store、邮件等原生应用创建了液态玻璃图标。第三方应用也正在采用相同的美学，对于背景简单的应用，无需更新即可呈现液态玻璃效果。
*   **界面元素：**
    *   Dock 栏和搜索按钮变为透明，与背景融为一体。
    *   应用文件夹采用磨砂玻璃设计，其色调会根据壁纸变化。
    *   编辑主屏幕时，交互按钮也变为透明。
    *   Dock 栏、文件夹和搜索按钮等界面元素具有光照效果，随 iPhone 移动而变化，使其看起来像真实的玻璃。

## 浅色、深色和着色模式
液态玻璃效果在浅色模式和深色模式下均可见，图标保持相同的堆叠玻璃外观，只是背景颜色更亮或更暗。
![ios 26 home screen standard](https://images.macrumors.com/t/D5Ib2JvQFF9BFnlnt_JG8YEI_eY=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/ios-26-home-screen-standard.jpg?lossy)

*   **模式名称变更：** 在自定义设置中，浅色模式被技术性地更名为“默认模式”。
*   **模式切换：** 新增“始终”（Always）和“自动”（Auto）切换按钮，用于启用永久浅色/深色样式或根据时间调整。
*   **图标大小调整：** 更改图标大小的“小”和“大”按钮已移至自定义界面的右上角。
*   **着色模式改进：** 与 iOS 18 不同，iOS 26 的着色模式下，图标在浅色模式中采用用户选择的完整颜色并配以白色图形；在深色模式中，背景是所选颜色的更深色调，但并非完全黑色。
![ios 26 home screen icon tint](https://images.macrumors.com/t/2j5oLzmjBNqR_tLCWo6P6MW5fRo=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/ios-26-home-screen-icon-tint.jpg?lossy)
*   着色图标的层次玻璃外观不如其他模式明显，但依然存在。

## 透明图标（Clear Icons）
苹果在 iOS 26 中新增了“透明”图标选项，与默认、深色和着色模式并列。
![ios 26 home screen clear icons](https://images.macrumors.com/t/nFW5KRfKwAoXTwHqme8HLTHz1aQ=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/ios-26-home-screen-clear-icons.jpg?lossy)

*   顾名思义，“透明”模式具有显著的液态玻璃效果，图标完全透明。
*   图标颜色会根据壁纸变化，并配有白色文本和设计。
*   “透明”设置有浅色和深色选项：浅色看起来像磨砂玻璃，深色看起来像着色玻璃。
*   如果想完全沉浸于液态玻璃效果并让 iPhone 看起来与众不同，透明选项是理想选择。

## 小组件（Widgets）
小组件也具有与图标相似的美学，但在默认模式下，它们与 iOS 18 中的外观没有太大区别。
![ios 26 widgets](https://images.macrumors.com/t/zHYZX8YtNta4EbH-pG_-K7iQAYs=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/ios-26-widgets.jpg?lossy)

*   开启“透明”选项后，小组件会变为透明，并呈现出与壁纸更协调的统一设计。

## 壁纸（Wallpaper）
在 iOS 26 中，可以直接从主屏幕编辑壁纸。
![ios 26 wallpaper home screen](https://images.macrumors.com/t/7TBkePJi5Xuq_kxmjW4S1K57akw=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/ios-26-wallpaper-home-screen.jpg?lossy)

*   长按显示屏，然后点击新的“编辑壁纸”选项。
*   壁纸界面允许更改主屏幕使用的图像，但不影响锁定屏幕。
*   如果将照片设置为壁纸，可以更改颜色、选择渐变或选择其他照片，还可以开启或关闭图像模糊效果。
*   壁纸在 iOS 26 中扮演着重要角色，因为它会根据设置影响 Dock 栏、文件夹和图标的颜色。

## 控制中心（Control Center）
控制中心也采用了液态玻璃设计，虽然功能保持不变，但整体外观有所不同。
![ios 26 control center](https://images.macrumors.com/t/EwKw5nJqgTf39z0r7PgfPeyPojc=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/ios-26-control-center.jpg?lossy)

*   与 iOS 18 的控制中心相比，iOS 26 版本图标具有深度，并带有液态玻璃的光线移动效果。
*   图标被着色，看起来像磨砂玻璃，一些用于调整控制中心的底层按钮也进行了更新。
*   图标略大，音量、亮度等条形图标变得更圆润。

## 其他主屏幕元素
灵动岛、通知中心、长按手势和 App 资源库的功能没有改变，仅在美学上有所调整。
![ios 26 home screen features](https://images.macrumors.com/t/sIMh6Mr7bxaiJtSkRxowhhOKTsU=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/iOS-26-Home-Screen-Features.jpg?lossy)

*   App 资源库文件夹是半透明的，搜索栏变为圆形。
*   小组件的玻璃外观强度会根据图标颜色选择而变化。
*   App 资源库图标略大，图标之间的填充更少。

## 网络应用（Web Apps）
在 iOS 26 中，将网站添加到主屏幕后，它将始终作为网络应用打开。
![ios 26 web apps](https://images.macrumors.com/t/6kRsvMZElFElLt4zS7IwPtlGFA=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/ios-26-web-apps.jpg?lossy)

*   在 iOS 18 中，网络应用功能已可用，但需要网页开发者进行配置才能作为网络应用运行。
*   现在，即使网站未明确设置为网络应用，它也会作为专用网络应用打开。
*   在将网站添加到主屏幕时，有一个“作为网络应用打开”（Open as Web App）选项可以关闭，如果用户希望网站在 Safari 中打开。
items.shortSummary: iOS 26 对 iPhone 主屏幕进行了重大视觉更新，核心是引入了“液态玻璃”设计。应用图标、Dock 栏、文件夹和控制中心都呈现出分层、半透明的玻璃质感，并带有光照效果。新增了“透明”图标模式，使图标完全透明并与壁纸融合。壁纸现在可以直接在主屏幕编辑，并影响界面颜色。此外，所有添加到主屏幕的网站默认作为独立网络应用打开，提升了用户体验。
items.content:
Apple's new Liquid Glass design is noticeable on the Home Screen right when you unlock your iPhone, though the degree of change is customizable. We've rounded up everything that's changed with the ‌iPhone‌'s main interface.


Liquid Glass Design


By default, app icons have a layered look with subtle depth, essentially appearing as multiple sheets of glass stacked on one another to create a glass-like translucent look.


Apple created Liquid Glass app icons for apps like Safari, Maps, Photos, the App Store, Mail and more. Third-party app icons are adopting the same aesthetic, and for apps with a simple design on a solid background, no update is needed. Icons like this already have a Liquid Glass look.

The dock is transparent and blends into the background behind it, and the same goes for the search button. App folders have a frosted glass design that also changes tint based on your wallpaper. When you edit your ‌Home Screen‌, the buttons that you interact with are also transparent.

Interface elements like the dock, folders, and the search button have a lighting effect that changes when you move your ‌iPhone‌, making them look like real glass.

Light, Dark and Tinted Modes


The Liquid Glass effect is apparent in both Light Mode and Dark Mode, with icons continuing to feature the same stacked glass look, just with a lighter or darker background.


Apple technically changed Light Mode to "Default Mode" in the customization settings where you can adjust color (long press on the display and tap on customize).

There are new "Always" and "Auto" toggles for enabling permanent Light or Dark styles or adjusting them based on time, and the Small and Large buttons for changing icon size have been relocated to the upper right of the customization interface.

Tinted mode looks different in iOS 26 than it did in iOS 18. Rather than icons featuring a black background with colored graphics, icons adopt the full color that you select with white graphics in Light Mode. In ‌Dark Mode‌, backgrounds are a much darker shade of the color you choose, but aren't entirely black.


With Tinted icons, the layered glass look isn't as obvious, but it's still present.

Clear Icons


Apple added a "Clear" icon option in ‌iOS 26‌ that's available alongside Default, Dark, and Tinted. As the name suggests, Clear has a dramatic Liquid Glass look with icons that are entirely transparent. The icons adopt the color of your wallpaper, with white text and designs.


There are Light and Dark options for the Clear setting. Light looks like frosted glass, while Dark looks like tinted glass. If you want to go all-in on Liquid Glass and have your ‌iPhone‌ look notably different, Clear is the option to choose.

Widgets


Widgets have some of the same aesthetic as icons, but on the whole, they don't look too much different from how they looked in ‌iOS 18‌ in the Default mode.


With the Clear option turned on, widgets are transparent and have a more cohesive design that matches with your wallpaper.

Wallpaper


You can edit your wallpaper directly from the ‌Home Screen‌ in ‌iOS 26‌. Long press on the display and then tap on the new "Edit Wallpaper" option.


The wallpaper interface lets you change the image that you're using on the ‌Home Screen‌, but it doesn't affect the Lock Screen. If you have a photo set as a wallpaper, for example, you can change the color, select a gradient, or choose a photo, plus you can turn blurring for images off or on.

Wallpaper takes a starring role in ‌iOS 26‌ because it affects the color of the dock, folders, and icons, depending on your settings.

Control Center


Control Center adopts Liquid Glass, so while the functionality is the same, the general look is different. Compared to the ‌iOS 18‌ Control Center, the ‌iOS 26‌ version has depth for the icons with the Liquid Glass shifting light effect.


The icons are tinted to look like frosted glass, and some of the underlying buttons for adjusting Control Center have been tweaked with the updated look. Icons are a little larger, and some of the bar-shaped icons for volume, brightness, and other settings are rounder.

Other Home Screen Elements


The Dynamic Island, Notification Center, long press gestures, and App Library have not changed beyond aesthetics. App Library folders are translucent and the search bar is rounded, and for widgets, there is a glass look of varying intensity depending on your icon color choice.


App Library icons are also slightly larger, with less padding between them.

Web Apps


When you add a website to your ‌Home Screen‌ in ‌iOS 26‌, it always opens as a web app. Web apps were available on the ‌Home Screen‌ in ‌iOS 18‌, but web developers needed to configure them to operate as web apps.


If websites weren't configured properly, they would open in Safari when added to the ‌Home Screen‌. Now a website will open as a dedicated web app, even if it hasn't been explicitly set up to work that way.

There is an Open as Web App option that can be toggled off when adding a website to a ‌Home Screen‌ if you prefer that websites open up in Safari.

Read More


We have a dedicated iOS 26 roundup that goes into detail on all of the new features that are available in the update.

## iPhone 17 Pro 即将推出：14 项新功能传闻汇总

苹果下一代 iPhone 17 Pro 和 iPhone 17 Pro Max 预计将在两个多月后发布，目前已有大量关于这些设备的传闻。

![iPhone 17 Pro in Hand Feature Lowgo](https://images.macrumors.com/t/QBrRFmdKiDc7T2ho2htS6d6B9I4=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/iPhone-17-Pro-in-Hand-Feature-Lowgo.jpg?lossy)

以下是关于 iPhone 17 Pro 机型的主要传闻变化：

### 最新传闻（6月和7月浮出水面）：

*   **苹果标志位置调整**：据称苹果标志在 iPhone 17 Pro 机型背部的位置将比以往更低，MagSafe 磁铁的布局也可能因此改变。
*   **更快的 MagSafe 充电**：iPhone 17 Pro 机型可能通过新版苹果 MagSafe 充电器提供更快的 MagSafe 无线充电速度。

### 此前传闻：

*   **铝制边框**：iPhone 17 Pro 机型据传将采用铝制边框，而 iPhone 15 Pro 和 iPhone 16 Pro 机型为钛金属边框，iPhone X 到 iPhone 14 Pro 则为不锈钢边框。设备的背部设计据称将采用全新的“部分铝制、部分玻璃”设计。
*   **矩形摄像头凸起**：iPhone 17 Pro 机型预计将采用带有圆角的较大矩形摄像头凸起。苹果似乎计划继续采用三角形排列的后置摄像头镜头。
*   **天蓝色配色**：与最新款 MacBook Air 类似，iPhone 17 Pro 机型据传将提供天蓝色选项。
*   **更大电池**：iPhone 17 Pro Max 据传设计会略厚，以容纳更大的电池。
*   **A19 Pro 芯片**：iPhone 17 Pro 机型预计将采用苹果下一代 A19 Pro 芯片，据报道将由台积电更先进的第三代 3nm 工艺制造。预计与当前 iPhone 相比，性能和能效将有适度提升。
*   **苹果自研 Wi-Fi 7 芯片**：所有四款 iPhone 17 机型据传都将配备苹果而非博通设计的 Wi-Fi 7 芯片。
*   **2400 万像素前置摄像头**：所有四款 iPhone 17 机型据称都将升级至 2400 万像素前置摄像头，而所有 iPhone 16 机型均配备 1200 万像素前置摄像头。
*   **4800 万像素后置长焦摄像头**：iPhone 17 Pro 机型据传将升级至 4800 万像素长焦摄像头，高于 iPhone 16 Pro 机型的 1200 万像素长焦摄像头。
*   **双向视频录制**：据 YouTube 频道 Front Page Tech 的 Jon Prosser 称，iPhone 17 Pro 和 iPhone 17 Pro Max 将允许用户在相机应用中同时使用前置和后置摄像头录制视频。
*   **8K 视频录制**：苹果据称在 iPhone 16 Pro 机型上测试过 8K 视频录制，但该功能尚未推出。鉴于 iPhone 17 Pro 机型预计将全面配备 4800 万像素后置摄像头，8K 视频录制可能会在这些设备上首次亮相。
*   **12GB 内存**：iPhone 17 Pro 机型，甚至 iPhone 17 Air，据传将配备 12GB 内存。此次升级应有助于提升 Apple Intelligence 和多任务处理的性能。所有四款 iPhone 16 机型均配备 8GB 内存。
*   **改进的散热**：所有四款 iPhone 17 机型据传都将进行内部设计更改，以实现更好的散热。Pro 机型尤其传闻将采用均热板散热系统。
items.shortSummary: 苹果 iPhone 17 Pro 和 Pro Max 预计将在两个多月后发布，将带来多项升级。主要传闻包括：苹果标志位置调整、更快的 MagSafe 充电、回归铝制边框、更大的矩形摄像头凸起、天蓝色配色。性能方面，将搭载 A19 Pro 芯片和苹果自研 Wi-Fi 7 芯片。摄像头将大幅升级，前置升至 24MP，Pro 版后置长焦升至 48MP，并有望支持双向和 8K 视频录制。此外，Pro 机型内存将增至 12GB，并改进散热系统。

items.content:
Apple's next-generation iPhone 17 Pro and iPhone 17 Pro Max are just over two months away, and there are plenty of rumors about the devices.


Below, we recap key changes rumored for the iPhone 17 Pro models.

Latest Rumors


These rumors surfaced in June and July:
  • Apple logo repositioned: Apple's logo may have a lower position on the back of the iPhone 17 Pro models, compared to previous models, and the layout of the MagSafe magnets may change as a result.

  • Faster MagSafe charging: iPhone 17 Pro models may offer faster MagSafe wireless charging speeds with a new version of Apple's MagSafe Charger.

Previous Rumors

  • Aluminum frame: iPhone 17 Pro models are rumored to have an aluminum frame, whereas the iPhone 15 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro models have a titanium frame, and the iPhone X through iPhone 14 Pro have a stainless steel frame. The back of the devices will supposedly have a new "part-aluminum, part-glass" design.

  • Rectangular camera bump: iPhone 17 Pro models are expected to have a large rectangular camera bump with rounded corners. Apple apparently plans to stick with a triangular arrangement for the rear camera lenses.

  • Sky Blue finish: Like the latest MacBook Air, the iPhone 17 Pro models are rumored to be available in a Sky Blue color.

  • Larger battery: The iPhone 17 Pro Max is rumored to have a slightly thicker design that allows for a larger battery.

  • A19 Pro chip: iPhone 17 Pro models are expected to use Apple's next-generation A19 Pro chip, which will reportedly be manufactured with TSMC's newer third-generation 3nm process. Like usual, expect modest year-over-year performance gains and power efficiency improvements compared to the current iPhones.

  • Apple-designed Wi-Fi 7 chip: All four iPhone 17 models are rumored to get a Wi-Fi 7 chip designed by Apple rather than Broadcom.

  • 24-megapixel front camera: All four iPhone 17 models are said to feature an upgraded 24-megapixel front-facing camera, whereas all iPhone 16 models are equipped with a 12-megapixel front-facing camera.

  • 48-megapixel rear Telephoto camera: An upgraded 48-megapixel Telephoto camera is rumored for the iPhone 17 Pro models, up from the 12-megapixel Telephoto camera on iPhone 16 Pro models.

  • Dual video recording: According to Jon Prosser, of the YouTube channel Front Page Tech, the iPhone 17 Pro and iPhone 17 Pro Max will allow users to record video with the front and rear cameras simultaneously in the Camera app.

  • 8K video recording: Apple allegedly tested 8K video recording on the iPhone 16 Pro models, but such functionality is still not available. With the iPhone 17 Pro models expected to have entirely 48-megapixel rear cameras, perhaps 8K video recording will debut on those devices.

  • 12GB of RAM: iPhone 17 Pro models, and even the iPhone 17 Air, are rumored to have 12GB of RAM. This upgrade should help to improve the performance of Apple Intelligence and multitasking. All four iPhone 16 models have 8GB of RAM.

  • Improved cooling: All four iPhone 17 models are rumored to feature internal design changes that result in better heat dissipation. A vapor chamber cooling system has been rumored for the Pro models specifically.
Check out our iPhone 17 Pro roundup to learn more.

items.title: 苹果何时推出对标Meta Ray-Ban智能眼镜的产品 (原标题: Here's When to Expect Apple's Answer to Meta's Ray-Ban Smart Glasses)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
# 苹果智能眼镜：对标Meta Ray-Ban的未来展望

据报道，苹果正在开发智能眼镜，旨在与Meta的Ray-Ban智能眼镜竞争，但预计还需要几年时间才能推出。

知名苹果供应链分析师郭明錤预测，苹果的智能眼镜将于2027年第二季度进入大规模生产。

![Meta Ray Ban Glasses](https://images.macrumors.com/t/X79VgcjqvQfCtnyb020a6-gDlkM=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/Meta-Ray-Ban-Glasses.jpg?lossy)

## 苹果智能眼镜的特点与定位

*   **功能类似Meta Ray-Ban：** 苹果的眼镜将允许用户拍照、录制视频和听音乐，支持触控和免提语音控制。
*   **核心用途：** 旨在让用户无需拿出手机即可捕捉瞬间。
*   **设计选择：** 苹果计划提供多种镜框和材质选项，但尚未透露是否会与Ray-Ban或Oakley等主要眼镜品牌合作。
*   **AR显示：** 郭明錤指出，苹果的第一代智能眼镜将不会内置增强现实（AR）显示屏，这与当前的Meta Ray-Ban类似。然而，Meta预计将在今年晚些时候推出带有AR显示屏的下一代Ray-Ban眼镜，这意味着苹果在这方面将保持落后。

## Meta Ray-Ban智能眼镜概览

Meta的智能眼镜已于2023年9月发布，美国起售价为299美元，并提供三种不同的Ray-Ban镜框，包括经典的Wayfarer款式。

*   **主要配置：**
    *   1200万像素摄像头，支持1080p视频录制。
    *   双扬声器和五个麦克风。
    *   右臂上的触控板。
    *   视频录制激活时有LED指示灯。
*   **续航能力：** 单次充电可使用长达4小时，配合充满电的充电盒可达36小时。
*   **市场表现：** 截至今年2月，Ray-Ban所有者EssilorLuxottica宣布已售出超过200万副眼镜，使其成为这一新兴设备类别中的相对成功产品。

## 与Apple Vision Pro的对比及市场预期

目前，苹果唯一的头戴式设备是Vision Pro，其起售价高达3499美元。自2024年2月推出以来，Vision Pro的销量估计仅为50万至70万台。

郭明錤认为，苹果的智能眼镜将取得更大的成功，预计2027年出货量将达到300万至500万台甚至更多。然而，2027年仍有相当长的时间，而该领域的竞争对手正以更快的速度进行创新。
items.shortSummary: 苹果正在开发智能眼镜，旨在与Meta Ray-Ban竞争，预计将于2027年第二季度量产。这款眼镜将支持拍照、录像和听音乐，并提供多种设计选项。与Meta当前型号类似，苹果首代产品不含AR显示屏，但Meta的下一代产品将具备此功能。尽管苹果的Vision Pro销量不佳，分析师预测其智能眼镜将更成功，2027年出货量有望达300-500万台。然而，苹果在创新速度上仍面临竞争压力。
items.translated_title: 苹果何时推出对标Meta Ray-Ban智能眼镜的产品
items.content:
Apple is reportedly developing smart glasses that could compete with the Meta Ray-Bans, but they are not expected to launch for a few more years.


Earlier this week, Apple supply chain analyst Ming-Chi Kuo said that he expects Apple's smart glasses to enter mass production in the second quarter of 2027. Similar to the Meta Ray-Bans, he said that Apple's glasses will allow users to take photos, record videos, and listen to music, with both touch and hands-free voice control. These type of smart glasses are intended to let you capture a moment without needing to take your phone out of your pocket.

Kuo said that Apple plans to offer multiple frame and material options for its smart glasses, but he did not indicate if it will partner with a major glasses brand, such as Ray-Ban or Oakley. Meta's smart glasses are offered with three different Ray-Ban frames, including the iconic Wayfarer style that has been popular for decades.

Like the Meta Ray-Bans, Kuo said Apple's first glasses will not have built-in augmented reality displays. However, next-generation Meta Ray-Bans with such displays are expected to launch later this year, so Apple will remain well behind.

Meta's glasses are equipped with a 12-megapixel camera with 1080p video capture, dual speakers, five microphones, a touchpad on the right arm, and an LED that indicates when video recording is active. Meta says the glasses last up to four hours with a single charge, and up to 36 hours with a fully-charged carrying case.

Meta Ray-Bans were released in September 2023, with U.S. pricing starting at $299. In February, Ray-Ban owner EssilorLuxottica announced that it had sold more than two million pairs of the glasses, making them a relative hit in a growing device category.

For now, Apple's only head-mounted device is the Vision Pro, which starts at a hefty $3,499. It is estimated that Apple has sold only 500,000 to 700,000 units of the Vision Pro, at best, since it launched in February 2024. Kuo believes that Apple's smart glasses will be far more successful, with shipments reaching 3-5 million units or more in 2027.

The unfortunate part is that 2027 remains quite a while away, with Apple's competitors in this space innovating at a much faster pace.
Tags: Apple Glasses, Meta

items.title: M5芯片传闻将于今年晚些时候在以下五款苹果产品中首次亮相 (原标题: M5 Chip Rumored to Debut in These Five Apple Products Later This Year)

# 苹果M5芯片传闻将首次亮相

苹果下一代M5芯片预计将于今年晚些时候在五款新产品中首次亮相，包括iPad Pro、Vision Pro、MacBook Pro、Mac mini和iMac。M5芯片据称将采用台积电最新的第三代3纳米工艺制造，这将比采用第二代3纳米工艺制造的M4芯片带来轻微的性能和能效提升。

![未来M5芯片设备](https://images.macrumors.com/t/KX--OT7qzLymbVgLgmho3PQ39K8=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/Future-M5-Chip-Devices.jpg?lossy)

以下是这些即将推出的设备的预期信息：

## iPad Pro

去年iPad Pro更新了OLED显示屏和更薄的设计后，今年可能只会获得相对较小的升级。苹果供应链分析师郭明錤曾表示，搭载M5芯片的iPad Pro型号将于2025年下半年进入大规模生产。目前的M4芯片iPad Pro型号于2024年5月发布，考虑到苹果通常以大约18个月的周期更新iPad Pro，下一代型号可能会在今年9月或10月发布。除了M5芯片，有传言称iPad Pro最终将获得超窄边框，但尚不清楚这是否会在今年实现。

![2024款iPad Pro](https://images.macrumors.com/t/7rxyhqBCwKf7A_UN7EUtoGJebk8=/400x0/article-new/2024/05/ipad-pro-2024.jpg?lossy)

## Vision Pro

郭明錤在最近一篇关于苹果未来头戴设备的文章中指出，Vision Pro将于今年晚些时候更新M5芯片。他预计搭载M5芯片的Vision Pro将于2025年第三季度（本周开始）进入大规模生产。郭明錤表示，Vision Pro的其他规格将保持不变，这意味着新芯片将是唯一的改变。目前搭载M2芯片的Vision Pro于2024年2月发布。郭明錤预计真正的Vision Pro 2要到2028年才会推出。

![带电池的Apple Vision Pro](https://images.macrumors.com/t/AiRCQZCscQbZRG2kXAhwM8feU_Q=/400x0/article-new/2023/06/Apple-Vision-Pro-with-battery-Feature-Blue-Magenta.jpg?lossy)

## MacBook Pro

苹果预计将于今年10月发布搭载M5、M5 Pro和M5 Max芯片的14英寸和16英寸MacBook Pro更新型号。如果您正考虑购买新的MacBook Pro，如果能够等待，最好等到明年。根据传闻，MacBook Pro将于明年迎来2021年以来的首次重大重新设计，升级内容包括OLED显示屏和更薄的设计。当然，届时苹果也将推出M6芯片。

![Apple MacBook Pro M4](https://images.macrumors.com/t/vmu3RcJ2zXzRTUhya6-707NJq04=/400x0/article-new/2024/10/Apple-MacBook-Pro-M4-hero.jpg?lossy)

## Mac mini

去年，苹果同时更新了MacBook Pro、Mac mini和iMac，今年很有可能再次这样做。本周早些时候，AppleInsider分享了一份据称是未来Mac型号的标识符列表，该出版物认为其中一个标识符很可能对应搭载M5 Pro芯片的Mac mini，同时应该也会有搭载普通M5芯片的型号。考虑到Mac mini去年迎来了自2010年以来的首次重新设计，这款小型台式电脑今年不太可能进行任何设计更改。

![M4 mini](https://images.macrumors.com/t/g6PlD5OS1ExVSA_t3DtKurUVlRM=/400x0/article-new/2024/10/M4-mini-Glowing-Blue.jpg?lossy)

## iMac

AppleInsider还分享了一个潜在的新iMac的标识符，该iMac将搭载M5芯片，并可能与今年晚些时候的下一代MacBook Pro和Mac mini型号一同发布。

![紫色M4 iMac](https://images.macrumors.com/t/Q7pSEOkIS69y-vDoAezUDW-4X3I=/400x0/article-new/2013/09/purple-m4-imac.jpg?lossy)

items.content:
Apple's next-generation M5 chip is expected to debut in five new products later this year, including the iPad Pro, Vision Pro, MacBook Pro, Mac mini, and iMac.


M5 chips will reportedly be manufactured with TSMC's latest third-generation 3nm process, which should result in slight performance and power efficiency improvements over M4 chips fabricated with its second-generation 3nm process.

Below, we outline what to expect from these upcoming devices.

iPad Pro



After being updated with an OLED display and a much thinner design last year, the iPad Pro will likely receive relatively smaller upgrades this year.

Last year, Apple supply chain analyst Ming-Chi Kuo said iPad Pro models with an M5 chip would enter mass production in the second half of 2025. The current iPad Pro models with the M4 chip launched in May 2024, and Apple typically updates the iPad Pro on a roughly 18-month cycle, so the next models could be released in September or October.

Beyond the M5 chip, it has been rumored that the iPad Pro will eventually gain ultra-thin bezels, but it is unclear if that will happen this year or later.

Vision Pro



In a recent post outlining Apple's future head-mounted devices, Kuo said the Vision Pro will be updated with the M5 chip later this year.

Kuo expects the Vision Pro with the M5 chip to enter mass production in the third quarter of 2025, which began this week. He said the Vision Pro's other specs will remain the same, so it sounds like the newer chip will be the only change.

The current Vision Pro with the M2 chip was released in February 2024.

Kuo does not expect a true Vision Pro 2 to launch until 2028.

MacBook Pro



Apple is expected to release updated 14-inch and 16-inch MacBook Pro models with M5, M5 Pro, and M5 Max chips in October this year.

If you are considering purchasing a new MacBook Pro, it might be best to hold off until next year, if you are able to wait. According to rumors, the MacBook Pro will be receiving its first major redesign since 2021 next year, with upgrades to include an OLED display and a thinner design. Of course, Apple will also be on to M6 chips by then.

Mac mini



Last year, Apple updated the MacBook Pro, Mac mini, and iMac simultaneously, and there is a decent chance it will do so again this year.

Earlier this week, AppleInsider shared a list of alleged identifiers for future Mac models, and the publication believes that one of those identifiers is likely for a Mac mini with an M5 Pro chip. There should be a model with a regular M5 chip as well.

Given the Mac mini received its first redesign since 2010 last year, the small desktop computer is unlikely to receive any design changes this year.

iMac



AppleInsider also shared an identifier for a potential new iMac with an M5 chip, which could arrive alongside the next MacBook Pro and Mac mini models later this year.

items.title: MacRumors 节目：苹果计划推出搭载 iPhone 芯片的低成本 MacBook (原标题: The MacRumors Show: Apple's Plan to Launch Low-Cost MacBook With iPhone Chip)
items.creator: Hartley Charlton
items.summary:
# 苹果计划推出搭载 iPhone 芯片的低成本 MacBook

本周的 MacRumors 节目讨论了苹果推出一款搭载 iPhone 芯片的低成本 MacBook 的计划。

## 核心信息
*   **产品定位**：苹果正计划推出一款全新的“经济型”MacBook。
*   **芯片**：该设备将搭载 iPhone 芯片，具体为 A18 Pro 芯片。这是首款使用 iPhone 芯片的 Mac，此前所有 Apple Silicon Mac 均采用 M 系列芯片。
*   **显示屏**：预计配备 13 英寸显示屏。
*   **颜色选项**：将提供银色、蓝色、粉色和黄色。
*   **内部标识**：该设备的内部标识符为“Mac17,1”。

## A18 Pro 芯片的特点与限制
*   A18 Pro 芯片首次在去年的 iPhone 16 Pro 中亮相。
*   由于采用 A18 Pro 芯片，这款 MacBook 预计将不具备 Thunderbolt 端口，统一内存可能不会超过 8GB，并且可能不支持连接多个外部显示器。这与 M 系列芯片 Mac 提供更高核心数、更大内存支持和更好外部显示支持的特点形成对比。

## 设计与命名策略
*   为了控制成本并与 MacBook Air 区分开来，这款新 MacBook 可能会重复使用旧款机器（如 M1 MacBook Air）的设计和机身。
*   苹果还可能恢复简单的“MacBook”名称，将其与 MacBook Air 和 MacBook Pro 分开，类似于 iPad 产品线中将“iPad”作为入门级型号的做法。

## 生产与发布时间
*   据分析师郭明錤报告，这款新 MacBook 预计将于 2025 年第四季度末或 2026 年第一季度初进入大规模生产。
*   这意味着该设备有望在明年上半年发布。

## 苹果的低成本设备策略
*   文章还讨论了苹果更广泛的低成本设备策略，以及其未来如何定位设备产品线。
items.shortSummary: 苹果计划推出一款搭载 iPhone A18 Pro 芯片的低成本 13 英寸 MacBook。这款设备将是首款采用 iPhone 芯片的 Mac，旨在提供更经济的入门级选择。为控制成本，它可能沿用旧设计并简化命名为“MacBook”。预计将于 2025 年底或 2026 年初量产，并在 2026 年上半年发布。

Earlier this week, Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo reported that Apple is set to launch an all-new "affordable" MacBook powered by an iPhone chip. The machine is expected to feature a 13-inch display, the A18 Pro chip, and color options that include silver, blue, pink, and yellow. MacRumors first spotted evidence of such a device in backend code related to Apple Intelligence last summer, and subsequently confirmed its use of the A18 Pro chip. The machine features the identifier "Mac17,1."

This would be the first Mac powered by an ‌iPhone‌ chip. To date, all Apple silicon Macs have contained M-series chips, which offer higher core counts, support for larger amounts of memory, and better external display support. The A18 Pro chip debuted in the iPhone 16 Pro last year.

With the A18 Pro chip, the device is highly unlikely to feature Thunderbolt ports, more than 8GB of unified memory, and support for more than one external display. In line with how Apple tends to handle its other low-cost devices, the new MacBook could re-use the design and chassis of an older machine like the M1 MacBook Air to keep costs down and differentiate it from the MacBook Air. Apple could also revive the simple "MacBook" moniker, separating it from the MacBook Air and MacBook Pro, and mirroring the iPad lineup, which simply has the iPad as the entry-level model.

According to Kuo, the new MacBook is expected to enter mass production late in the fourth quarter of 2025 or early in the first quarter of 2026, which situates launch in the first half of next year.
